name: Provisioning
query:
SELECT
    p.circuit_id AS "Circuit ID",
    p.customer AS "Customer",
    p.site_name AS "Site Name",
    p.solution_name AS "Solution Name",
    p.status AS "Status",
    p.provisioning_date AS "Provisioning Completed Date",
    MAX(e.employee_name) AS "Assigned To",
    MAX(td.creation) AS "Assigned Date"
FROM 
    `tabProvisioning` p
LEFT JOIN 
    `tabToDo` td 
        ON td.reference_name = p.name
       AND td.reference_type = 'Provisioning'

LEFT JOIN
    `tabEmployee` e
        ON e.user_id = td.allocated_to   -- convert email → employee name

GROUP BY
    p.circuit_id,
    p.customer,
    p.site_name,
    p.solution_name,
    p.status,
    p.provisioning_date

ORDER BY 
    p.provisioning_date DESC;
